name: Great Buddha - Limited Edition
description:
My Thoughts of Buddha : The Way Of Life.

Buddha is the power of mediator between Heart, Mind and Soul. He teaches how these three things comes in trigonal junction to achieve supreme happiness. As we know Love belongs to heart, intelligence belongs to mind, and peace belongs to soul, are the powerful state of mind of human beings. It is not easy to achieve the supreme happiness in world, until find oneself to accomplish the power of control. As Buddha quoted; “To conquer oneself is a greater task than conquering others.”
